snippet: Samuel Thornton was arrested outside a home in Philadelphia, and investigators recovered the handgun that was stolen from the officer’s purse during the robbery.
abstract: Authorities say Samuel Thornton, man suspected of attacking off-duty New York police officer and stealing her department-issued gun, is arrested in Philadelphia; officer was carrying gun in her purse, in apparent violation of department regulations.
lead_paragraph: Samuel Thornton was arrested outside a home in Philadelphia, and investigators recovered the handgun that was stolen from the officer’s purse during the robbery.

headline.main: Suspect Arrested in Attack on Off-Duty New York Police Officer
headline.print_headline: Police Arrest Man in Attack and Retrieve Officer’s Gun
